summary: Completed comprehensive testing of MGNREGA Dashboard for Uttar Pradesh districts. All backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate). Frontend functionality working well with minor navigation issue for direct URL access to district pages.

integration_issues.flow: Direct URL navigation to district detail pages
integration_issues.issue: Direct navigation to /district/{code} URLs doesn't work properly - page stays on home instead of loading district detail
integration_issues.workaround: Navigation works correctly when going through home page and clicking district cards

passed_tests: Get all UP districts endpoint - returns 50 districts with correct structure
Current performance data for multiple districts (UP01, UP02, UP03, UP49, UP50)
Historical performance data (6 months) with proper structure
Comparison performance data with current/previous/changes structure
Home page loads with 50 UP districts displayed
Language toggle between Hindi and English works correctly
District search functionality filters correctly (English, Hindi, partial matches)
Search shows 'No districts found' message for invalid searches
District cards clickable and navigate to detail page
District detail page shows all performance metrics correctly
Budget allocation and spending displayed with progress bar (70.9% utilized)
Historical trend charts render correctly (16 SVG chart elements found)
Budget trend bar charts render correctly
Comparison with previous month shows percentage changes
Back button navigates to home page correctly
All interactive elements have proper data-testid attributes

success_percentage.frontend: 95% - All major functionality working, minor navigation issue

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix direct URL navigation to district detail pages. Currently /district/{code} URLs don't load properly and redirect to home page. Navigation works fine when clicking through district cards from home page.
